alert.note: Alert for Medina; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 3:22PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Medina and northeastern Wayne Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 321 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lodi, or 11 miles southwest of Medina, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wadsworth, Orrville, Rittman, Doylestown, Lodi, Creston, Dalton, Chippewa Lake, Seville, Westfield Center, Marshallville, Spencer, Gloria Glens Park, Burbank and Chippewa-On-The-Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
